description:
Bible 2 - Enjoy Reading the Book of Galatians using Sentence Block Diagram Method

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Learn Piano with Rosa - Rosa's Piano Online School - Teaching 32 Courses!

OVER 10,000 Successful students have already taken my piano online courses since July 2014 with 231 - 5 Star Reviews

Course Updated: November 15, 2015

*************************************************************************

How would you like to read the Bible with fresh insights?

Many people find the Book of Galatians difficult to read. They get lost in the many ideas that are conveyed in the epistle.

There are many gems and spiritual riches in this short book of 6 chapters.

The question is: How can you draw out these riches at one reading?

Here's the Secret: I am going to show you my Sentence BLOCK Diagram technique that will help you interact with the many difficult concepts in the Book of Galatians. I will lay out the steps for you so that you can see how I modify the traditional "sentence diagram" to a much simplified method to understand the main theme and sub themes of the many difficult text in this Epistle.

You will see how the text of the Book of Galatians flow out in its structure, so much that you can develop lesson outlines easily for Bible studies, sermons, and Sunday School.

Enjoy discovering the great richness and deep insight in the Word of God.

Enroll into this course and let's have some fun together,

Rosa


***************************************************************************

title: Bible #2 - Galatians - Sentence Block Diagram Technique
